input_email_body:
Subject: Support Data Breach

An incident involving the inadvertent compromise of medical data occurred due to a system misconfiguration My name is Sophia Rossi.. We have initiated a reset of access protocols and a review of user permissions to address the issue. Urgent assistance is required to prevent unauthorized access. You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.
